title: Roast heritage carrots with garlic scapes and fresh almonds
description: Garlic scapes are the stalks of garlic plants. They have a very distinctive flavour, similar to wild garlic. This colourful dish celebrates the best of British seasonal ingredients.
ingredients: 6 heritage carrots, preferably in red, yellow and orange, with the green tops still intact, peeled and washed
100g/3½oz fresh green almonds, cracked and peeled
salt and freshly ground black pepper
